rows.label: qst002602_msg001
rows.name:
Ah! What's that on the ground?
Is it Lucarion's turtle carving?

rows.label: qst002602_msg002
rows.name:
Oh, look at that! Could it be the carving
that Lucarion kid was looking for?

rows.label: qst002602_msg003
rows.name:
Meh! Fallen thingy...
Maybe is thing Lucarion looking for?

rows.label: qst002602_msg004
rows.name:
Ah, I've spotted something.
Perhaps it's that child's lost item.

rows.label: qst002602_msg005
rows.name:
Ah! That thing on the ground. Is that
Lucarion's Kamekichi?

rows.label: qst002602_msg006
rows.name:
Ahhh! A Graaz Pippito
ran off with it!

rows.label: qst002602_msg007
rows.name:
If that's what he's looking for
then we need to get it back to him!

rows.label: qst002602_msg008
rows.name:
Hey! That Graaz Pippito
ran off with it!

rows.label: qst002602_msg009
rows.name:
If that's what he's looking for
then we need to get it back to him!

rows.label: qst002602_msg010
rows.name:
Meh-meh!
Nasty Graaz Pippito ran off with item!

rows.label: qst002602_msg011
rows.name:
If that what he looking for, then
we need to get it back to him!

rows.label: qst002602_msg012
rows.name:
Did that thieving Graaz Pippito
just make off with the item?

rows.label: qst002602_msg013
rows.name:
If that's what he was looking for,
then we must make haste.

rows.label: qst002602_msg014
rows.name:
Ugh! That Graaz Pippito just
snatched it from under our noses!

rows.label: qst002602_msg015
rows.name:
If that's what he was looking for, then
we gotta get it back to him sharpish.
